original_text:
He will bring down your high fortified walls
    and lay them low;
he will bring them down to the ground,
    to the very dust.
korean_text: 네 성벽의 높은 요새를 헐어 땅에 내리시되 진토에 미치게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: He will bring down your high fortified walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너의 높고 견고한 성벽을 무너뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: he will bring them down to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 땅에까지 이르게 하실 것이며
